ProcedureOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: SESSREF=session-name
      
Specifies the name of a CAS session to which you want to connect.

Syntax: SESSUUID=session-uuid
      
Specifies the universally unique identifier (UUID) of an existing CAS session. You must obtain 
the SESSUUID from the existing session before you can specify it in this option.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: DELETEMODEL MODELNAME="model-name" 
    MODELTABLE="model-table" | caslib.model-table | schema.model-table
    <delete-model-options>; 
    
Deletes a model from CAS or an external database.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: MODELNAME="model-name"
          
Specifies the name of the model to be deleted.

Syntax: MODELTABLE="model-table" | "caslib.model-table " | schema.model-table
          
Specifies the name of the table that contains the model to be deleted.

Syntax: AUTHDOMAIN = "authentication-domain" 
          
Specifies the name of the authentication domain that contains the credentials (user name and password) 
that are used to access Teradata.

Syntax: CASLIB="caslib" 
          
Specifies the name of the caslib associated with the model table when deleting a model from CAS.

Syntax: CLASSPATH="classpath" 
          
Specifies the class path used in the Hadoop call context. The class path can be a folder or individual 
JAR files. The Hadoop configuration folder must be included in the class path.

Syntax: DATABASE="database-name" 
          
Specifies the name of the Teradata database.

Syntax: MODELDIR="model-directory" 
          
Specifies the root HDFS folder containing the model directory from which the model is to be deleted.

Syntax: PASSWORD=|PASSWD=|PWD=|PASS="password" 
          
Specifies the password for the user ID on the Hadoop or Teradata server.

Syntax: PERSISTTABLE=YES | NO 
          
Specifies whether the updated model table should be saved to the caslib data source associated with the table.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies that the updated model table should be saved to the caslib data source associated with the table.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies the the updated model table should not be saved to the caslib data source associated with the table.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: PROMOTETABLE=YES | NO 
          
Specifies whether the updated model table should be promoted to global scope on the CAS server.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies that the updated model table should be promoted to global scope on the CAS server.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies that the updated model table should not be promoted to global scope on the CAS server.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: REPLACETABLE=YES | NO 
          
Specifies whether to allow an existing model table to be replaced when the updated model table 
is saved to the caslib data source.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Allows an existing model table to be replaced when the updated model table is saved to the caslib data source.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Does not allow an existing model table to be replaced when the updated model table is saved to the caslib data source.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: SCHEMA="schema-name" 
          
Specifies the name of the Teradata schema.

Syntax: SERVER="server" 
          
Specifies the name of the Teradata server or Hive server.

Syntax: TARGET=CAS | HADOOP | TERADATA 
          
Specifies the target environment to which the model is to be deleted.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies to delete the model from a model table in CAS.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies to delete the model from the Hadoop server.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip3: Specifies to delete the model from a model table in the Teradata database.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: USERNAME=|USER=|USERID=|UID='id' 
          
Specifies an authorized user ID on the Hadoop or Teradata server.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: PUBLISHMODEL
    MODELNAME ="model-name" 
    MODELTABLE="model-table" | caslib.model-table | schema.model-table
    PROGRAMFILE="file-path" | fileref 
    < publish-model-options> ; 
    
Publishes a DS2 model to CAS or an external database.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: MODELNAME="model-name"
          
Specifies the name of the model to be publish.

Syntax: MODELTABLE="model-table" | "caslib.model-table " | schema.model-table
          
Specifies the name of the table that contains the model to be published.

Syntax: PROGRAMFILE="file-path" | fileref
          
Specifies the file that contains the model program to be published.

Syntax: AUTHDOMAIN = "authentication-domain" 
          
Specifies the name of the authentication domain that contains the credentials (user name and password) 
that are used to access Teradata.

Syntax: CASLIB="caslib" 
          
Specifies the name of the caslib associated with the model table when deleting a model from CAS.

Syntax: CLASSPATH="classpath" 
          
Specifies the class path used in the Hadoop call context. The class path can be a folder or individual 
JAR files. The Hadoop configuration folder must be included in the class path.

Syntax: DATABASE="database-name" 
          
Specifies the name of the Teradata database.

Syntax: FORMATFILE="file-path" | fileref
          
Specifies the file that contains the user-defined format XML definition to be published.

Syntax: FORMATITEMSTOREFILE="file-path" | fileref
          
Specifies the file containing the format item store to be published.

Syntax: KEEPLIST=YES | NO
          
Specifies whether to include a KEEP statement in the DS2 model program that was automatically 
generated from an analytic store model.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies that a KEEP statement should be included in the DS2 model program.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies that a KEEP statement should not be included in the DS2 model program.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: MODELDIR="model-directory" 
          
Specifies the root HDFS folder where the model directory is created.

Syntax: MODELNOTES="model-notes" 
          
Specifies the model notes to be written to the model table.

Syntax: MODELTYPE=DATASTEP | DS | DS2
          
Specifies the type of the input model program.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies that the input model program is DATA step code.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies that the input model program is DS2 code.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: MODELUUID="model-uuid" 
          
Specifies that the Model UUID is written to the model table.

Syntax: OUTDIR="work-directory" 
          
Specifies the local output directory that contains the program file that was converted from DATA step to DS2.

Syntax: PASSWORD=|PASSWD=|PWD=|PASS="password" 
          
Specifies the password for the user ID on the Hadoop or Teradata server.

Syntax: PERSISTTABLE=YES | NO 
          
Specifies whether the updated model table should be saved to the caslib data source associated with the table.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies that the updated model table should be saved to the caslib data source associated with the table.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies the the updated model table should not be saved to the caslib data source associated with the table.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: PROMOTETABLE=YES | NO 
          
Specifies whether the updated model table should be promoted to global scope on the CAS server.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies that the updated model table should be promoted to global scope on the CAS server.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies that the updated model table should not be promoted to global scope on the CAS server.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: REPLACEMODEL=YES | NO 
          
Specifies whether to allow an existing model in the model table to be replaced by the model being published.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Allows an existing model in the model table to be replaced by the model being published.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Does not allow an existing model in the model table to be replaced by the model being published.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: REPLACETABLE=YES | NO 
          
Specifies whether to allow an existing model table to be replaced when the updated model table 
is saved to the caslib data source.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Allows an existing model table to be replaced when the updated model table is saved to the caslib data source.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Does not allow an existing model table to be replaced when the updated model table is saved to the caslib data source.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: SCHEMA="schema-name" 
          
Specifies the name of the Teradata schema.

Syntax: SERVER="server" 
          
Specifies the name of the Teradata server or Hive server.

Syntax: STOREFILES="file-path" <..., "file-path"> | fileref<..., fileref> 
          
Specifies a list of files, one for each analytic store to be published.

Syntax: STORETABLES= ("store-table" | "caslib.store-table", ..., "store-table" | "caslib.store-table") 
          
Specifies one or more CAS blob table names that contain the analytic stores to be published. Each table must include a VARBINARY column named "_state_" that contains the analytic store blob.

Syntax: TARGET=CAS | HADOOP | TERADATA 
          
Specifies the target environment to which the model is to be published.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies to publish to a model table in CAS.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies to publish to the Hadoop server.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip3: Specifies to publish to a model table in the Teradata database.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: USERNAME=|USER=|USERID=|UID='id' 
          
Specifies an authorized user ID on the Hadoop or Teradata server.

Syntax: VARXMLFILE="file-path" | fileref
          
Specifies the file that contains the variable metadata XML to be used during translation of an input 
DATA step model program to DS2.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: RUNMODEL
    MODELNAME ="model-name" 
    MODELTABLE="model-table" | caslib.model-table | schema.model-table
    <run-model-options>; 
    
Publishes a DS2 model to CAS or an external database.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: MODELNAME="model-name"
          
Specifies the name of the model to run.

Syntax: MODELTABLE="model-table" | "caslib.model-table " | schema.model-table
          
Specifies the name of the table that contains the model to run.

Syntax: AUTHDOMAIN = "authentication-domain" 
          
Specifies the name of the authentication domain that contains the credentials (user name and password) 
that are used to access Teradata.

Syntax: CASLIB="caslib" 
          
Specifies the name of the caslib associated with the model table, input table, and output table, 
hen running a model in CAS.

Syntax: CLASSPATH="classpath" 
          
Specifies the class path used in the Hadoop call context. The class path can be a folder or individual 
JAR files. The Hadoop configuration folder must be included in the class path.

Syntax: CONFIGPATH="configuration-path" 
          
Specifies a single folder where all the Hadoop and Spark configuration files reside.

Syntax: CUSTOMJAR="file-path" 
          
Specifies the local JAR file that contains the user-provided custom reader. The custom JAR file 
is automatically copied to the Hadoop cluster during job submission.

Syntax: DATABASE="database-name" 
          
Specifies the name of the Teradata database.

Syntax: EPOPTIONS="options-string" 
          
Specifies the options that are passed to the SAS_SCORE_EP stored procedure that invokes the 
SAS Embedded Process for Teradata.

Syntax: FORCEOVERWRITE=YES | NO 
          
Specifies whether to force deletion of the output data directory before running the Hadoop 
MapReduce job.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies to force deletion of the output data directory before running the Hadoop MapReduce job.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies to keep the output data directory before running the Hadoop MapReduce job.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: HIVEPORT="port"
          
Specifies the Hive server port number.

Syntax: INHDMD="file-path" 
          
Specifies the name of the input Hadoop metadata file on HDFS.

Syntax: INQUERY="sql-query" 
          
Specifies an SQL SELECT statement that defines the inputs to the SAS Embedded Process for Teradata.

Syntax: INTABLE="input-table" | caslib.input-table | schema.input-table
          
Specifies the name of the input table.

Syntax: KEEPLISTCOLUMNS=(column <..., column>) 
          
Specifies the name of the column (or columns) to be kept by the DS2 program.

Syntax: KEEPLISTFILE="file-path" 
          
Specifies the name of the file that contains a list of columns to be kept by the DS2 program.

Syntax: MODELDIR="model-directory" 
          
Specifies the root HDFS folder where the model directory is created.

Syntax: OUTHDMD="file-path" 
          
Specifies the name of the output Hadoop metadata file that is created by the SAS Embedded Process.

Syntax: OUTKEY=(column, ..., column) 
          
Specifies the name of one or more columns used for the primary index of the output table that 
is created by the SAS Embedded Process for Teradata.

Syntax: OUTPUTFOLDER="directory-path" 
          
Specifies the name of the directory where the output files are stored.

Syntax: OUTPUTFORMATCLASS="class-name" 
          
Specifies the name of the output format class in dot notation that is used to write the output records.

Syntax: OUTRECORDFORMAT=BINARY | DELIMITED 
          
Specifies the format of the output record that is produced by the SAS Embedded Process for Hadoop.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies that the output record is binary.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies that the output record is delimited.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: OUTSCHEMA="output-schema" 
          
Specifies the Hive output database schema name when running a model in Hadoop.

Syntax: OUTTABLE="output-table" | caslib.output-table | schema.output-table
          
Specifies the name of the output table.

Syntax: OUTTABLEOPTIONS="options-string" 
          
Provides user-specified options that are appended to the Hive CREATE TABLE statement.

Syntax: PASSWORD=|PASSWD=|PWD=|PASS="password" 
          
Specifies the password for the user ID on the Hadoop or Teradata server.

Syntax: PLATFORM=MAPRED | SPARK
          
Specifies the platform where the Hadoop Embedded Process is to be executed.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies to run the model in MapReduce.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies to run the model in Spark.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: PROPERTIES="property=value" 
          
Specifies a Hadoop configuration property and its value. Any Hadoop configuration property 
can be assigned using this option.

Syntax: SCHEMA="schema-name" 
          
Specifies the name of the Teradata schema.

Syntax: SENDPROGRAM=YES | NO 
          
Specifies whether the model program source code should be sent back to the client and displayed 
for the user.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies that the model program source code should be sent back to the client and displayed for the user.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies that the model program source code should not be sent back to the client and displayed for the user.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: SERVER="server" 
          
Specifies the name of the Teradata server or Hive server.

Syntax: TARGET=CAS | HADOOP | TERADATA 
          
Specifies the target environment to which the model is published.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Specifies to publish to a model table in CAS.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Specifies to publish to the Hadoop server.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip3: Specifies  to publish to a model table in the Teradata database.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata: uns the SAS Embedded Process for Hadoop with traces on.

Syntax: USERNAME=|USER=|USERID=|UID='id' 
          
Specifies an authorized user ID on the Hadoop or Teradata server.
